name: mtness style: firebug
description:
genuine mtness viewsource style, ready for firebug

runs perfectly well with mtness style: viewsource -> http://userstyles.org/styles/19429
for more information on the mtness style, please visit http://mtness.net/style

many thanx to wifflebunz (http://userstyles.org/users/23718) for finding the right url-prefix! 
some enhancements are based on "Firebug Compact" by jtsai (http://userstyles.org/users/25306)

Towards Perfection, mtness.

This style is compatible with the following firebug addons:
CSS Usage,
Firecookie,
Page Speed,
Validator,
YSlow.
+++ UPDATE 2011-04-11 +++
- display fixes for fb1.7


+++ UPDATE 2010-02-17 +++

- some minor style fixes


You should have a look at my other styles, too! -> http://userstyles.org/users/3613
